reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of CPSC 110, CPSC 260.
Note: Depending upon how many students sign-up for this section either an additional lab section will be opened or the existing labs will be expanded slightly so as to have a sufficient number of seats for the students registered in the course. However, there is no guarantee that the resulting seats will fit your time table so make sure to take that into consideration when planning your time table.

description: Design, development, and analysis of robust software components. Topics such as software design, computational models, data structures, debugging, and testing.
